tutorial.welcome: Welcome to Sights, an app designed to help you understand what's around you. To get started, tap anywhere on the screen.
tutorial.takePhoto: To take a picture, simply tap once anywhere on the screen. The app will automatically capture and analyze what's in front of you.
tutorial.autoRead: When system screen reader is not enabled, the app will automatically read the analysis text. You can tap the screen to stop reading, or use the auto-read toggle to disable this feature.
tutorial.adjustSpeed: When auto-read is enabled, you can change the reading speed by sliding your finger up or down on the screen, or by tapping the speed button.
tutorial.retake: After viewing results, you can take another picture by either tapping the retake button or double tapping the screen. Let's get started!
